activities: Direct Agents, Inc. is an digital marketing agency that provides online marketing services for clients in the United States and the European Union.  Our services include media buying, search engine marketing, and lead generation.  We generally do not collect consumer data on our own, but merely provide advertising services for clients looking to advertise to consumers.  If advertisers collect personally identifiable information on their websites, they are required to clearly post privacy policies and abide by privacy guidelines in their jurisdictions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
